# Test vectors for RoutingControl ports
# 0 means force 0
# 1 means force 1
# L means expect 0
# H means expect 1
# X means donâ€™t care
########################
## Clock cycle = 10ns ##
########################
#time FIFO_DataOut_list                                                                              SelectedPort   
0     0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000       111
5     0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000       111
10    0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000       111           
15    0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000       111
# First Port (0) packet is coming => Address=1:1
20    0000000000010001  0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000010001       111
25    0000000000010001  0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000010001       000
# Second Port (1) packet is coming => Address=2:2
30    0000000000000000  0000000000100010  0000000000000000  0000000000100010  1111111111111111       111       
35    0000000000000000  0000000000100010  0000000000000000  0000000000100010  0000000000000000       111        
40    0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000100010  0000000000000000       001         
45    0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000001  0000000000000000       111       
50    0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000010  0000000000000000       111        
# Third Port (2) packet is coming => Address=3:3
55    0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000110011  0000000000000000  0000000000000000       111         
60    0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000110011  0000000000000000  0000000000000000       010      
65    0000000000000000  0000000000110011  0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000       111    
70    0000000000000000  0000000000000001  0000000000000000  0000000000000000  0000000000000000       011
